pages.name: Calculating Spousal Support
pages.description:
To calculate how much spousal support should be paid, you can use the Spousal Support Advisory Guidelines or DIVORCEmate’s free spousal support calculator at www.mysupportcalculator.ca.

You can also talk with a child support officer (they can also help with spousal support), family justice counsellor or a lawyer.

It is helpful for both the court and the other party if you include a calculation with this reply showing how much you believe should be paid in spousal support according to the spousal support guidelines.

elements.name: attachingCalculations
elements.title: Will you be attaching calculations showing how much spousal support you believe should be paid according to the Spousal Support Advisory Guidelines?

elements.name: notAttachingCalculationsReason
elements.title: Please explain why you will not be attaching calculations:
elements.description: You do not need to use any special wording. The key is to be clear about why you are not providing calculations with your application.
